noEmbeddingModel: Please add an embedding model from the RAG settings page first

empty.connectDescription: To use Knowledge, first connect to your tldw server so new sources can be indexed.
empty.connectExample1: Open Settings → tldw server to add your server URL.
empty.connectExample2: Use Diagnostics if your server is running but not reachable.
empty.demoDescription: This demo shows how Knowledge can organize your sources for better search. Connect your own server later to index your real documents and transcripts.
empty.demoExample1: See how knowledge bases and sources appear in this table.
empty.demoExample2: When you connect, youâ€™ll be able to upload files and text that tldw can search across.
empty.title: No knowledge sources yet
empty.description: Add knowledge bases so tldw can ground answers in your own documents, transcripts, and files.
empty.example1: Upload PDFs, transcripts, or notes that you frequently reference in chat.
empty.example2: Organize related documents into a single knowledge base to reuse across chats.
